author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-South African Reserve Bank Says Bank of Baroda To Exit South Africa Operations
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - SOUTH AFRICAN RESERVE BANK :
* BANK OF BARODA HAS NOTIFIED THE OFFICE OF THE REGISTRAR OF BANKS OF ITS EXIT FROM SOUTH AFRICA‍​
* REGISTRAR, PART OF SARB, IS IN DISCUSSIONS WITH BANK OF BARODA TO ENSURE ORDERLY WITHDRAWAL SO THAT NO DEPOSITOR IS DISADVANTAGED Source text for Eikon: ( goo.gl/SEMhvR ) Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
